The hospital is unable to release the student from hospital.
The student will not receive any letters about their possible non-compliance with visa conditions
The student will be deported from Australia for not providing current information to its education provider.
The student will not be believed when he tells the institution he was sick.

question_results.question:
A student you recruited to study in Australia has contacted you. Their school has been forced to close down and they will no longer be able to attend classes. Which of the following is likely to happen to the student because their school is closing:

Answer options:
The student will have to go back to their home country because they will no longer be enrolled at a school in Australia. The school will cancel their visa and help them move back to home. The student will receive a refund from the School.
The student will have to go back to their home country because they will no longer be enrolled at a school in Australia. The student will be unable to recover their tuition fees.
The student should be able to transfer to another school in Australia because their status as an international student is protected by the ESOS Act 2000 and the Tuition Protection Service (TPS).
None of the above.
correct_answers: The student should be able to transfer to another school in Australia because their status as an international student is protected by the ESOS Act 2000 and the Tuition Protection Service (TPS).
extracted_answers: The student should be able to transfer to another school in Australia because their status as an international student is protected by the ESOS Act 2000 and the Tuition Protection Service (TPS).
question_results.full_response:
The student should be able to transfer to another school in Australia because their status as an international student is protected by the ESOS Act 2000 and the Tuition Protection Service (TPS).

question_results.question:
DHA considers evidentiary requirements for students from different countries on the basis of:

Answer options:
How many friends and relatives a student has who are currently living or studying in Australia.
How much business in trade and exports Australia does with the student’s country.
Statistical evidence of how students from that country comply with their visa conditions based on previous students’ behaviour in the last 12 months.
How likely it is that students will want to live in Australia after they graduate.
correct_answers: Statistical evidence of how students from that country comply with their visa conditions based on previous students’ behaviour in the last 12 months.
extracted_answers: Statistical evidence of how students from that country comply with their visa conditions based on previous students’ behaviour in the last 12 months.
question_results.full_response:
Statistical evidence of visa compliance from students of that country in the past year is considered by DHA when determining evidentiary requirements for students from different countries.

question_results.question:
A student you recruited to study in Australia is studying a Bachelor of Engineering at university on a Student Visa. The student is finding their study program very difficult and would like to study part- time rather than full-time. The student can:

Answer options:
Study part-time under The National Code as it allows students to study part-time in exceptional circumstances.
Not change to part-time study. Under The National Code students on student visa are not allowed to study part-time.
Study part-time if the Vice-Chancellor of the university approves their study plan.
Not study part-time because the Vice-Chancellor of their university does not allow students to study part-time.
correct_answers: Not change to part-time study. Under The National Code students on student visa are not allowed to study part-time.
extracted_answers: Not change to part-time study. Under The National Code students on student visa are not allowed to study part-time.
question_results.full_response:
Answer: Not change to part-time study. Under The National Code students on student visa are not allowed to study part-time.

Can apply for a tourist visa.
Cannot apply for an extension to her student visa.
